Articles.Content:
Hey! I just discovered this game today and I already adore it.

After trying to get to the Mun at least thirty times, I finally did it, overshot it, slingshotted (is that a word?) around Kerbin, got into the Mun\'s orbit and am currently on the other side of the sun from Kerbin, waiting to get close enough to be caught in it\'s gravity.

This is an amazing game

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

lol ... Kerbollo 56 got sling-shotted into a solar orbit, trying to rescue the crew of Kerbollo 11. I\'ll be posting that up as a challenge in the Challenge forum soon, because no matter how hard I try, I can\'t do either of them.

You\'ll find some ... interesting ... things happen to your Kerbals during the course of their Kerbonaut careers (death being the primary one).

Welcome! (I\'m a newcomer too!)
When I found this game I liked it too.
